name: rsk-cli
description: CLI tool for Rootstock blockchain using viem

scripts.wallet: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js createWallet
scripts.balance: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js balance
scripts.transfer: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js transfer --testnet --address 0xa5f45f5bddefC810C48aCC1D5CdA5e5a4c6BC59E --value 0.001
scripts.tx-status: pnpm run build && node dist/bin/index.js tx --testnet --txid 0x86deb77e1d666ae6848630496d672da8b5f48292681bda33f8f04245c55dde26
